name: playwright-js-bdd-tests

scripts.allure:generate-report:web: npx allure generate allure-results/chromium allure-results/firefox allure-results/webkit --clean -o allure-report
scripts.allure:generate-report:mobile: npx allure generate allure-results/android allure-results/ios --clean -o allure-report
scripts.debug:chromium:tags: TEST_LEVEL=web BROWSER='chromium' PARALLEL=1 npx cucumber-js --parallel 1 --require support/world.js --require steps --tags "$TAGS"
scripts.test:chromium:tags: cross-env TEST_LEVEL=web BROWSER=chromium npx cucumber-js -p chromium --require support/world.js --require steps --tags "$TAGS"
scripts.test:firefox:tags: cross-env TEST_LEVEL=web BROWSER=firefox npx cucumber-js -p firefox --require support/world.js --require steps --tags "$TAGS"
scripts.test:webkit:tags: cross-env TEST_LEVEL=web BROWSER=webkit npx cucumber-js -p webkit --require support/world.js --require steps --tags "$TAGS"
scripts.test:chromium:smoke: TEST_LEVEL=web BROWSER='chromium' npx cucumber-js -p chromium --require support/world.js --require steps --tags '@smoke-web'
scripts.test:firefox:smoke: TEST_LEVEL=web BROWSER='firefox' npx cucumber-js -p firefox --require support/world.js --require steps --tags '@smoke-web'
scripts.test:webkit:smoke: TEST_LEVEL=web BROWSER='webkit' npx cucumber-js -p webkit --require support/world.js --require steps --tags '@smoke-web'
scripts.test:crossbrowser:smoke: TEST_LEVEL=web HEADLESS=false npm-run-all allure:remove-results-sh --parallel test:chromium:smoke test:firefox:smoke test:webkit:smoke
scripts.test:crossbrowser:smoke:headless: TEST_LEVEL=web HEADLESS=true npm-run-all allure:remove-results-sh --parallel test:chromium:smoke test:firefox:smoke test:webkit:smoke
scripts.test:android:tags: cross-env TAG=$TAG TEST_LEVEL=android npx cucumber-js -p android --parallel 1 --require steps --require support/world.js --tags "$TAG"
scripts.test:android: TEST_LEVEL=android npx cucumber-js -p android --parallel 1 --require steps --require support/world.js --tags '@android'
scripts.test:ios:tags: cross-env TEST_LEVEL=ios npx cucumber-js -p ios --parallel 1 --require steps --require support/world.js --tags "$TAG"
scripts.test:ios: TEST_LEVEL=ios npx cucumber-js -p ios --parallel 1 --require steps --require support/world.js --tags '@ios'
scripts.test:api:tags: TEST_LEVEL=api npx cucumber-js -p api --require support/world.js --require steps --tags
scripts.test:api: TEST_LEVEL=api npx cucumber-js -p api --require support/world.js --require steps --tags '@api'
scripts.test:mobile:js:args: node support/mobile/run-mobile-tests.js open_allure=$OPEN_ALLURE clear_old_results=$CLEAR_OLD_RESULTS platform=$PLATFORM target_device=$TARGET_DEVICE device_profile_name=$DEVICE_PROFILE_NAME tag=$TAG
scripts.docker-remove-all: npm run docker-remove-images && npm run docker-remove-containers && npm run docker-compose-down
scripts.docker-compose-run-tests-args: OPEN_ALLURE=false BROWSER=chromium HEADLESS=false TAG='@sign-in' npm run docker-compose-run-tests
scripts.allure:generate-report:web:win: npx allure generate allure-results\chromium allure-results\firefox allure-results\webkit --clean -o allure-report
scripts.allure:generate-report:mobile:win: npx allure generate allure-results\android allure-results\ios --clean -o allure-report
scripts.debug:chromium:tags:win: cross-env TEST_LEVEL=web BROWSER=chromium PARALLEL=1 npx cucumber-js --parallel 1 --require support/world.js --require steps --tags "%TAGS%"
scripts.test:chromium:tags:win: cross-env TEST_LEVEL=web BROWSER=chromium npx cucumber-js -p chromium --require support/world.js --require steps --tags "%TAGS%"
scripts.test:firefox:tags:win: cross-env TEST_LEVEL=web BROWSER=firefox npx cucumber-js -p firefox --require support/world.js --require steps --tags "%TAGS%"
scripts.test:webkit:tags:win: cross-env TEST_LEVEL=web BROWSER=webkit npx cucumber-js -p webkit --require support/world.js --require steps --tags "%TAGS%"
scripts.test:chromium:smoke:win: cross-env TEST_LEVEL=web BROWSER=chromium npx cucumber-js -p chromium --require support/world.js --require steps --tags "@smoke-web"
scripts.test:firefox:smoke:win: cross-env TEST_LEVEL=web BROWSER=firefox npx cucumber-js -p firefox --require support/world.js --require steps --tags "@smoke-web"
scripts.test:webkit:smokev: cross-env TEST_LEVEL=web BROWSER=webkit npx cucumber-js -p webkit --require support/world.js --require steps --tags "@smoke-web"
scripts.test:crossbrowser:smoke:win: cross-env TEST_LEVEL=web HEADLESS=false npm-run-all allure:remove-results:win --parallel test:chromium:smoke test:firefox:smoke test:webkit:smoke
scripts.test:crossbrowser:smoke:headless:win: cross-env TEST_LEVEL=web HEADLESS=true npm-run-all allure:remove-results:win --parallel test:chromium:smoke test:firefox:smoke test:webkit:smoke
scripts.test:android:tags:win: cross-env TEST_LEVEL=android TAG=%TAG% npx cucumber-js -p android --parallel 1 --require steps --require support/world.js --tags "%TAG%"
scripts.test:android:win: cross-env TEST_LEVEL=android npx cucumber-js -p android --parallel 1 --require steps --require support/world.js --tags "@android"
scripts.test:ios:tags:win: cross-env TEST_LEVEL=ios TAG=%TAG% npx cucumber-js -p ios --parallel 1 --require steps --require support/world.js --tags "%TAG%"
scripts.test:ios:win: cross-env TEST_LEVEL=ios npx cucumber-js -p ios --parallel 1 --require steps --require support/world.js --tags "@ios"
scripts.test:api:tags:win: cross-env TEST_LEVEL=api npx cucumber-js -p api --require support/world.js --require steps --tags
scripts.test:api:win: cross-env TEST_LEVEL=api npx cucumber-js -p api --require support/world.js --require steps --tags "@api"
scripts.test:mobile:js:args:win: node support/mobile/run-mobile-tests.js open_allure=%OPEN_ALLURE% clear_old_results=%CLEAR_OLD_RESULTS% platform=%PLATFORM% target_device=%TARGET_DEVICE% device_profile_name=%DEVICE_PROFILE_NAME% tag=%TAG%
scripts.docker-remove-images:win: for /f %i in ('docker images -q') do docker rmi -f %i
scripts.docker-remove-containers:win: for /f %i in ('docker ps -aq') do docker rm -f %i
scripts.docker-remove-all:win: npm run docker-remove-images && npm run docker-remove-containers && npm run docker-compose-down
scripts.docker-compose-run-tests-args:win: cross-env OPEN_ALLURE=false BROWSER=chromium HEADLESS=false TAG='@sign-in' npm run docker-compose-run-tests

description: Inside that directory, you can run several commands:
